experience.description:
Enabling security in the CI/CD pipeline on a large scale Linux application.
Design and develop of the HTTP/2 and QUIC servers-side and client support implementation (POSIX, embedded library). As a result, an increase in the efficiency of performance and an expansion of the scope of use are achieved.

Coordinating development efforts, driving the implementation and design of product features, improvements to the toll-collection system https://cutt.us/eoIel (Linux, multithreaded, run-to-completion scheduling, adaptation event-driven solution).
Arrangements of processes and the product ownership restoration after two teams replacements; reducing the total cost of changes in functionality; accelerating the pace of the production cycle with towards quality-centric methodologies.

Improving Robotic Process Automation (RPA) interaction and integration, data element mappings (semantic in the 'form filler'), the desktop application interoperability with on-line and web-services https://cutt.us/T2SZG

Redesigning data source replication services in heterogeneous environments (data integration).
Tools, toolchain, for automatic formal verification of the components of a virtual machine (Design-by-contracts, LLVM, smart contracts).
Restoring service mesh functionality for a Business Process Management solution based on a service-oriented architecture (Linux, microservices).

Design and development of separate subsystems for distributed applications based on service-oriented architecture (SOA);
Application object model management services (consistency, fault tolerance, automation API) with mandatory access control (MAC) to objects and application controls.

Agent part for Robotic Process Automation solutions in a heterogeneous environment based on Microsoft, RedHat, Oracle (management of processes, software components and GUI elements, Window Stations & Terminals);
Design and development cross-platform transport layer of interaction via asynchronous sockets, a multithreaded analog of epoll/kqueue for Windows 2k/2k3.

higher.name: St. Petersburg Ulyanov (Lenin) State Electrotechnical University ’LETI’
higher.faculty: Automated Control and Data Processing Systems
